profile:
One of the most common comments we hear from potential clients is their level of frustration when it comes to finding a contractor that offers a diverse level of services, who can deliver services on budget with a very high level of quality, competency, communication, and patience. 
 
These qualities are at the very core of our business practices.  We say what we mean, mean what we say and do what we said.  

We specialize in the services that will make your home special, including interior remodeling, exterior improvements, and custom designs.

At Ardis Kitchens Baths & Beyond, we work diligently to provide premium service at competitive rates. From design innovation and installation expertise to customer-centric service, we surpass the competition, year after year.

Our team of trained and highly skilled industry professionals are waiting to get started on your unique project, contact us today!
products:
Cabinetry for every room - Kitchen, bathroom, closet, bar, entertainment, library.
Counter tops - laminate, granite and quartz.
Kitchen and bathroom fixtures.
Tile, hardwood, laminate, luxury plank.
Cabinet paint.
Interior and exterior paint.
Trims, mouldings, railings, stairs.
services:
3D cabinet design, full colour.
Supply and install all cabinetry.
Paint/Stain of all cabinetry.
Paint/Stain of stairs and railings.
Full gut kitchen and bath renovations; remove walls.
Drywall, paint, trim, flooring.
Reconfigure entire level of home.
brands: Cambria, Caesarstone, Riobel, Mirolin, Maax, Neptune, Delta, Kohler, Dulux paint, Sherwin Williams, Benjamin Moore, Cera Gres, Anatolia, Tufftex, Mannington, Beckham Brothers, Shaw
specialities: Kitchen and bathroom full renovation, Basement renovations and painting cabinetry and entire home.
